text: Gunter Creek is a stream in Barry County of southwest Missouri. The headwaters of Gunter Creek are located south of Butterfield and the stream flows northeast to its confluence with Flat Creek south of McDowell.Missouri Atlas & Gazetteer, DeLorme, 1998, First edition, p. 61, The stream source is located at and the confluence is at . Gunter Creek has the name of the pioneer Gunter family. ==See also== *List of rivers of Missouri ==References== Category:Rivers of Barry County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Missouri
title: Gunter Creek
